overview:
Michael D. Croft operates, manages and executes strategic initiatives for eSavV Technologies. Managing and forming strategic partnerships with affiliated companies and acquisitions of related firms. Oversees client relations, product development, quality control, creative services, growth initiatives, marketing strategies, financials, and day-to-day operations.

Michael is an entrepreneur and software engineer with over 12 years experience with small, medium, and large Internet, Intranet, SOA, Client-server, CRM, B2B and B2C applications. Mentor, coach and technical solutions advisor. Liaison to project sponsors and executives for technical feasibility regarding project requirements, risk management and deliverables. An excellent communicator between technical and business units who can translate complex information into easily understood terms.
